Career And Financial Tarot Spreads

The Career Path Spread

  1. Is my current job my ideal job?
  2. What actions must be taken to further my career?
  3. What doors are closed? What aspects of my professional life can no longer be altered?
  4. What is my level of performance in my current job? Am I on the right track or am I slacking and why?
  5. What do I need to change and improve?
  6. Is something in my past affecting my current work status?
  7. What results can I expect if I follow the guidance from this reading? If this is a negative card, maybe there's something misinterpreted in the reading and you'll have to revisit these questions later.

Spreads from Labyrinthos
